languages.text:
The wearer gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies who have no adjacent allies. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack.
Also, the range of the wearer's {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} and {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +1 cell.
languages.original_text: Дают +4 к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} против врагов, у которых на соседних клетках нет союзников. При атаке {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} применяется только к первому удару или выстрелу. Также увеличивают дальность Пробежки и Рывка на 1 клетку.

traits.locale_text: Grants +4 damage to enemies with no allies in a 3-cell radius and +1 cell to Dash and Charge range.

The wearer gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies who have no adjacent allies. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Also, the range of the wearer's Dash and Charge {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +1 cell.

The wearer gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies who have no adjacent allies. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Also, the range of the wearer's Dash and Charge {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +1 cell.

The wearer gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies who have no adjacent allies. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Also, the range of the wearer's Dash and Charge {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +1 cell.

Также увеличивают дальность {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Пробежки{/g} и {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывка{/g} на 1 клетку.

Also, the range of the wearer's {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} and {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +1 cell.

traits.locale_text:
Дают +4 к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} против врагов, у которых на соседних клетках нет союзников. При атаке {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} применяется только к первому удару или выстрелу.
Также увеличивают дальность {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Пробежки{/g} и {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывка{/g} на 1 клетку.
Дают +4 к урону против врагов, у которых нет союзников в радиусе 3 клеток. Увеличивают дальность Пробежки и Рывка на 1 клетку.

languages.text:
装备者在攻击邻近没有盟友的敌人时，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高4点。进行{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击时，此效果只对首次打击或射击生效。
装备者{g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}急速冲刺{/g}与{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}英勇冲锋{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的射程扩大1格。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies who have no adjacent allies. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack.
Also, the range of the wearer's {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} and {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +1 cell.

traits.locale_text: 装备者在攻击邻近没有盟友的敌人时，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高4点。进行{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击时，此效果只对首次打击或射击生效。 装备者急速冲刺与英勇冲锋{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的射程扩大1格。

languages.text:
Concede al portador +4 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} contra enemigos que no tienen aliados adyacentes. Solo se aplica al primer golpe o proyectil en los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}.
Además, aumenta el alcance de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Carrera{/g} y {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Carga{/g} del portador en +1 casilla.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies who have no adjacent allies. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack.
Also, the range of the wearer's {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} and {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +1 cell.

traits.locale_text: Concede al portador +4 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} contra enemigos que no tienen aliados adyacentes. Solo se aplica al primer golpe o proyectil en los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}. Además, aumenta el alcance de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} Carrera y Carga del portador en +1 casilla.

languages.text: 使用者が、隣接する味方がいない敵にダメージを与えると、その{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に+4のボーナスがつく。初回の攻撃または{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}連射{/g}攻撃の初弾にのみ適用される。 使用者のダッシュおよび突撃{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の範囲が+1セル増加する。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies who have no adjacent allies. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Also, the range of the wearer's Dash and Charge {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +1 cell.

traits.locale_text: 着用者は3セル以内に味方がいない敵に対してダメージが+4増加し、ダッシュと突撃の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射程{/g}が+1セル増加する。

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} gegen Gegner ohne angrenzende Verbündete. Gilt nur für den ersten Angriff oder das erste Projektil eines {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriffs{/g}.
Außerdem erhöht sich die Reichweite der {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Sprinten{/g}- und {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Ansturm{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} um +1 Zelle.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies who have no adjacent allies. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack.
Also, the range of the wearer's {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} and {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +1 cell.

traits.locale_text: Gewährt dem Träger +4 Schaden gegen Feinde ohne Verbündete in einem 3-Zellen-Radius und erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} von Sprinten und Ansturm um +1 Zelle.

languages.text:
Le porteur bénéficie d'un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de +4 contre les ennemis sans alliés adjacents. S'applique uniquement au premier coup ou projectile d'une attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}.
De plus, la portée des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Sprint{/g} et {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} du personnage est accrue de +1 case.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies who have no adjacent allies. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack.
Also, the range of the wearer's {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} and {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +1 cell.

traits.locale_text: Le porteur bénéficie d'un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de +4 contre les ennemis sans alliés adjacents. S'applique uniquement au premier coup ou projectile d'une attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}. De plus, la portée des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} Sprint et Charge du personnage est accrue de +1 case.

Le porteur bénéficie d'un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de +4 contre les ennemis sans alliés adjacents. S'applique uniquement au premier coup ou projectile d'une attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}. De plus, la portée des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} Sprint et Charge du personnage est accrue de +1 case.

languages.text:
Giyen kişi, bitişiğinde dost birim olmayan düşmanlara +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Seri saldırılarda{/g} yalnızca ilk atak veya mermiye uygulanır.
Ayrıca giyen kişinin {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Atılım{/g} ve {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Hücum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerinin{/g} menzili +1 hücre artar.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies who have no adjacent allies. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack.
Also, the range of the wearer's {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} and {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +1 cell.
